Checkboxes With Icons

Source: src/elements/checkboxes/checkboxes-with-icons 

<label class="checkbox">
  <input name="category" type="checkbox" value="cash-expenses" />
  <span class="checkbox__label items-center">
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="checkbox__icon icon-6 text-blue-bright fill-blue-light">
      <use xlink:href="#icon-cash-expenses-v2"></use>
    </svg>
    <span>Cash & Expenses</span>
  </span>
</label>
